page.title: 12Hiltingbury - What We Found
page.content:
While walking around Hiltingbury the children soon discovered the variety and diversity of their environment.
The house styles which date from the early 1900's to the present. Mostly detached properties but also including blocks of 4 storey flats.
The local shops were as they expected but the small businesses were a surprise. An Amusement Arcade Supplier, and Illuminated Sign Maker and a supplier of Freezer Packaging materials all nestled into the landscape.
The land itself which ranges from residential to open fields, conifer plantations to small deciduous copses all blended together into their own locality.
